short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small Chrome extension which shows the actual status of a Bitrise build in the Chrome tab's title!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension helps you if you have a bunch of ongoing Bitrise builds by showing the build's status in the Chrome tab's title.

Disclaimer: This project is made by somebody whose life is a lot easier because of Bitrise but has absolutely no legal connection with Bitrise. The Bitbot is the property of Bitrise and is used by their permission. Even though this extension does nothing more than modifying your tab's title, use it at your own risk! If you experience any issues with your machine, builds, blood pressure or anything else while using this extension, Bitrise has nothing to do with it. This project is open source, you can find its code on my Github.
